name: The Last Island (BIGGRIMM)
description:
[The Last Island] Play the Demo & Indiegogo Funding Open!

Indiegogo Funding here

「Last Island」is a PC platform Survival action game.
You'll be a special agent sent to an island contaminated with zombie viruses.
Defeat the mutated monster and search the island!

1.0.1 - bug fix / delete analytics
